subject: Warm Greetings,
body:
Warm Greetings,
My Name is Attorney Gareth Brown. I have my client's (Mr. Charles Jackson
Jr.) firm instruction to contact you and help finalize the claims of the
donated cash prize to you. My client was the mega winner of $344.6 million
Power ball Mega Millions Jackpot: WATCH HIM HERE:
https: // www. youtube.com/watch?v=0MUR8QEIMQI
He is donating Sum of Three Million Five Hundred Thousand Dollars to 5
random people. 
After a computerized email selection system (ESS) from a
database of over 100,000,000.00 email addresses drawn from all the email
server's world over, your email was selected to receive the donation prize
courtesy of my client benevolence. Your secret donation code allotted to
you is: RFCJ-441672020468302.
Get back to me at the earliest so i can send you further details for
claims without further delay. Congratulations once again!
Yours truly,
Attorney Gareth Brown

subject: Re: Warm Greetings,
body:
Hello Attorney Gareth Brown,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite surprised and intrigued by this unexpected news. It's not every day that one hears about such a generous donation!

Could you please provide more information about this process? How was my email selected and what does the donation code mean? Also, could you tell me more about your client, Mr. Charles Jackson Jr.? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Mary
